title: Women 's average age at first marriage in Italy 2018 , by region
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average age in the y axis.
The maximum Average age 34.7 is found at Month Aosta Valley and the minimum is found at Calabria where Month is 30.6.
There is a difference of 4.1 between the maximum Month Aosta Valley and minimum Month Calabria.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average age in the y axis.
The Average age is appeared to be the highest at Month Aosta Valley and lowest at Month Calabria.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average age in the y axis.
The maximum Average age 34.7 is found at Month Aosta Valley and the minimum is found at Calabria where Month is 30.6.
There is a difference of 4.1 between the maximum Month Aosta Valley and minimum Month Calabria.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average age for 20 number of Months.
The maximum Average age 34.7 is found at Month Aosta Valley and the minimum is found at Calabria where Month is 30.6.
The second highest Average age is appeared to be the Month Liguria.
The difference of Average age between the highest and lowest Month is 4.1.
The Month Aosta Valley has the highest Average age, followed by Liguria, and Sardinia. Down to the Month Calabria which is the lowest.
Overall Average age has declined over the Months.
Month Emilia-Romagna, Tuscany, and Sardinia have the same Average age.
The average Average age in all 20 Months is 32.86.
